It represents the insurance company on the local level and is authorized to carry out business assigned to it, provided that all its acts and activities are approved by the company. It receives its remunerations from the company and not from the insured parties.

Such firms use mathematical and statistical methods in order to calculate the rates set forth by insurance companies for each of the insurance types. The basic elements for the above-said can be the person's age or the age of the insured thing, as well as the years during which a person is expected to live, and the dangers that may arise.

name: Acupuncture Center

activityGroup: Residential Care Activities For Mental Retardation, Mental Health And Substance Abuse
name: Addiction Rehabilitation Center
description: A healthcare facility provides residential treatment for people recovering from addiction as part of continuum of care for effective treatment. It is characterized by a high level of psychological and social intervention at a critical stage of recovery. Residential treatment is most effective when people are immediately discharged from an in-patient hospital unit, or when their addiction symptomology requires a low level of assisted withdrawal and when abstinence is a goal of treatment. In addition residential treatment is most valuable where there is polydrug misuse, co-occurrence of substance misuse and mental illness or complex social and relationship issues.

activityGroup: Social Work Activities Without Accommodation For The Elderly And Disabled
name: Adult Day Healthcare Facility
description: A non-residential facility specializing in providing services that are designed to meet the needs of functionally and/or cognitively impaired adults. Adult day health care facilities provide a caring, non-institutional setting for individuals who, for their own safety and well-being, can no longer be left at home alone. These facilities often provide protected settings and include a mixture of health and support services. Many offer specialized services such as programs for individuals with developmental disabilities, traumatic brain injury, HIV/AIDS, and vision and hearing impairments

description: A Community-based non-residential facility specializing in providing services that are designed to meet the needs of functionally and/or cognitively impaired children. Special need center facilities provide a caring, non-institutional setting for individuals who, for their own safety and well-being, can no longer be left at home alone. These facilities often provide protected settings and include a mixture of health and support services. Many offer specialized services such as programs for individuals with developmental disabilities, vision and hearing impairments.

name: Traditional Chinese Medicine Center
description: A health facility licensed to provide medical treatment based on Chinese dualistic theory (Yin, Yang). This theory is used to understand pathology, diagnosis and treatment. Diagnostic conclusions are drawn from the quality of the voice, and notes are made of the face and tongue color, and examination of pulse. Acupuncture, moxibustion, hydrotherapy are integral part of the traditional Chinese medicine.

name: Unani Medicine Center
description: A health facility specialized in traditional therapy based on theories, beliefs and experience of indigenous to different cultures of the middle east. This includes cupping (Hejama), herbal medicine, cauterization, dietary, as well as the Unani medicine which is based on Hippocrates theory of four bodily humors. Drugs are of plant, animal or mineral origin, either in crude or compound formulas

name: Management of Self Owned Properties
description: Includes firms engaged in managing self owned residential units, also handling contractual arrangement with the firms in charged of maintenance and security. Such firms are not allowed to practice real estate brokerage.

activityGroup: Electrical, plumbing and other installation activities
name: Electrical, plumbing and other installation activities
description: Electrical, plumbing and other installation activities

activityGroup: Electrical, plumbing and other installation activities
name: Radio, TV Station, Cinema, Theater Equipment Installation and Maintenance
description: Includes installing equipment of filming, recording, presentation, lighting, audio and visual effects, control systems for radio and T.V. studios and cinema, radio- broadcasting and TV transmission equipment, also, furnishing, flooring, fitting fixtures, repairing and maintenance.

name: 3D Printing Products Production
description: Includes firms specialized in producing products by the 3D printing through creating designs of objects with AutoCAD software, then the printer creates a three-dimensional object using lasers to fuse powdered materials together layer by layer, the powdered materials involve metal, plastic, rubber, silicon, ceramic, such technology involves different products and parts such as, jewelry, industrial parts, vehicles, dental and medical industry.

name: Access Cradles Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing suspended access cradles for cleaning and maintaining multi-storey buildings, the process involves cutting and fixing steel and aluminium bars and sections to fabricate the components, including roof mounted davit jibs, gantries, trolley units and monorails, as well as fixing electrical motors and safety equipment.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Adhesive and Paper Slitting
description: Includes using slitting machines to cut large rolls of adhesives and papers into narrower rolls.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Adhesives Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing adhesive materials for sticking paper, glass, metal, plastic or wood pieces, to use in printing, lamination, packaging, in construction for fixing ceramic, slabs and maquette, or wall-paper...etc, also producing adhesive tapes in paper, plastic, fabrics or others.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Agarwood and Incense Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing agarwood, oriental perfumes and incense.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Agricultural Pesticides Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing pesticides for preventing, controlling and exterminating agricultural pests, including disease carriers infecting plants or animals, by pests we mean all minute animals, plants, or living creatures that can be harmful or destructive, such as insects, spiders, nematode, bacteria, fungal, moss, plant viruses, harmful weeds, parasitic plants, harmful birds, rodents and others.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Agricultural Tractors Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing tractors and related agricultural machinery for different operations such as ploughs, seeders, harvesters, planters, threshers, sorters, manure spreaders and soil preparation.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Air-Conditioning Units Assembling
description: Includes assembling unitary and packaged terminal units usually placed in a window or wall opening with the evaporative unit on the interior and the condensing unit on the exterior, and they allow the cooling by drawing the heat from the room and discharged to the environment.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Albums Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing photograph albums, whether made of plastic, cardboard or other materials.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Aluminium Foils Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the heat conductor and resistant aluminum foils for meat and poultry roasting and for food packaging.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Aluminium Smelter
description: Includes extracting pure aluminum from its primary ores, such as bauxite or alumina, smelting and fabricating in blocks, cylinders or ingots in a way enabling reprocessing by means of traction or rolling to produce aluminum products.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Aluminum Extrusion
description: Includes cold and hot extrusion to pure aluminum blocks or cylinders to produce aluminum sections, rods, tubes, pipes, wire cables and others usable in making metallic construction products.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Aluminum Rolling
description: Includes cold and hot rolling operationsto pure aluminum blocks or cylinders to produce aluminum panels and plates, breaking aluminum panels in zigzag order to use them for various industrial purposes or in constructions.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Aluminum powder Production
description: Includes extracting aluminium powder from its basic ores by grinding to use in industrial production or metal coating.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Amusement Centers Equipment Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing amusement centers’ equipment such as billiard tables, electronics and manual games devices etc.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Animal Oil and Fat Manufacturing
description: Includes extracting oil and fat out of animal dairy as well as out of animals and fish and their fats and bones (artificial ghee).
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Animal and Birds Feed Manufacturing
description: Includes producing domestic animals and birds canned or dried feed, such as grains, seeds, meats, fruits. It also includes health feed like vitamins and tonics, other than veterinary medicines.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Antennas Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturingthe electric devices which convert electric power into radio waves to use in radio and television broadcasting, telecommunication receivers, wireless computer network, radar.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Arabic Gown Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the wear over men gowns from knitted and crocheted fabrics.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

description: Arabic Gowns Tailoring

name: Arabic Men Wears Tailoring
description: Arabic Men Wears Tailoring

name: Architectural , Advertising and Decorative Models Manufacturing
description: Includes preparing small physical models of buildings or engineering projects or advertising and decorative items, used to visualize how the finished work will look like after constructing or making.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Artificial Limbs Manufacturing
description: TBD
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Artificial Marble Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing artificial marble by by heating the mixture of marble dust, acrylic or polyester resin with pigments , and then cut in sheets or shapes and sanded on one or both sides to use in different construction applications.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Artificial Plants and Flowers Making
description: TBD
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Artistic Work Including Preparation Of Litho Stones And Prepared Woodblocks

name: Asphalt Paving Industry and asphalt products
description: Environment Protection and Development Authority Department of Civil Defense
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Asphalt and Paving Materials Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing asphalt and paving materials derived from petroleum distillation for using in road paving.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Audio Cassettes Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing blank magnetic and optical recording media for audio materials recording, including tapes, cassettes, diskettes, discs.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Auto Accessories Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of accessories and attachments fitted to motor vehicles in order to modify the external outline of the car, such as bumpers, air deflectors, additional tyre covers, baggage support base and other accessories made of metals, fiber glass or reinforced plastic...etc.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Auto Electrical Wires Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the wire that connect motor vehicle electrical equipment.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Auto Irrigation Devices Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing equipment and accessories used in the artificial application of water to the land or soil where the natural rainfall was insufficient to support crops, it involves pivots for overhead irrigation, pumps, sprinklers, drippers, control and automation equipment.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Auto Tarpaulin Tailoring
description: Includes sewing tarpaulin using strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material to use as loose covers for cars in order to protect from wind, rain, or sunlight.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Auto Upholstery Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of all kinds of auto-upholstery pieces such as seats or steering wheel and gear covers...etc. It also includes the manufacture of mats and similar products made of fabric, leather, plastic, or other natural or artificial fibers, which are prepared by means of cutting and tailoring.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Automatic Gates and Barriers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing and assembling remotely controlled gates and barriers to control entry and exit of cars in residential building and private or public parks, it includes making aluminium and steel gates and barriers, assembling motors, remote control devices and transmission and receivers.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Automobile Assembly
description: Includes manufacturing of assembled motor vehicles for transporting passengers, mainly sedans, sports cars and buses, the process involves the assembling using parts and components fully manufactured outside the factory or partly inside
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Automobile Outfitting

activityGroup: Manufacture of wearing apparel, except fur apparel

name: Men's Garments Manufacturing

This includes all kinds of shirts, night wear (pyjamas), in-house clothes, beach and bath wear, trousers, shorts, ready made men's suits, ties and others. This activity does not include tailoring and sewing shops, as they are classified under class 3800.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

This includes metallic wrapping materials such as aluminum chips or compound materials manufactured from several of the above-said materials.

Also included are after shaves, shaving creams, body lotions, deodorants, clothes and floor cover fragrances. The perfumes concerned could be in liquid, solid or powder forms.

name: Radiator Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing radiators used for cooling internal combustion engines automobiles radiators through heat exchanging process, the cooling involves passing water through the engine block, where it absorbs heat from the engine, then the hot water is then fed into the radiator which releases the heat to the ambient air.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Ready Mixed Concrete Manufacturing
description: Includes the concrete that is manufactured in a factory or batching plant, according to a set recipe, and then delivered to a work site by truck mounted in transit mixers.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Reflective, Enamelled and Insulant Glass Production
description: Includes processing glass sheets by means of enameling with reflective material to acquire the ability of reflecting sunlight and heat. It also includes coating glass sheets with the required material to act as an insulator against heat, sound and strong light or others.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Refrigerated Trailers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the refrigerator truck designed to carry perishable freight at specific temperatures which can be equipped with any one of a variety of mechanical refrigeration systems powered diesel engines.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Refrigerators, Freezers and Water Coolers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing refrigerators, freezers, water coolers for household and commercial and industrial use.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Reinforcement Steel Fabrication
description: Includes the process of cutting stainless steel and malleable steel bars in different sizes and forms to produce cylindrical shapes, columns or nets used in reinforcing of buildings, constructions and other ferroconcrete works.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Remote Control Systems Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing guiding devices for navigating flying or moving objects and such as planes, boats, vehicles and others by transmitted signals remotely controled systems.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Repackaging and Refilling
description: Includes firms engaged in the repackaging and bottling of bulky solid or liquid products which are elsewhere manufactured, in consumer or commercial packs to make ready for final consumption or export.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Rice Husking and Polishing
description: Includes removing husks from the paddy to render it consumable, it involves the protective layer surrounding the grain to produce brown rice, then removing the germ and bran layers from the grain to produce white rice.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Rigs and Oilfield Platforms Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing metal and concrete offshore oil platform to extract and process oil and natural gas from offshore oilfields, these platforms usually contain facilities to house the workforce, they are either built on artificial islands, floating or fixed to the ocean.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Cotton and metal nets and ropes manufacturing
name: Ropes Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of all kinds of ropes from fibrous materials such as cotton, jute, linen, paper, plastic, twine, including even the fiber glass. This includes processes of fiber curling, dyeing, packing and wrapping (Metal rope manufacturing is classified under class number 2899).
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Rose Water Bottling
description: Includes bottling rose water after distilling rose petals and water.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Rubber Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing natural or artificial rubber products, such as mats, rubber rings and glass fixation requisites.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Safety Glass Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing safety glass either by laminating a plastic layer between two sheets of glass , or by tempered glass, such glass is safe in using in the automobile windshields as it break into rounded grains rather than sharp shards.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Safety Harness Fabrication
description: Includes fabricating harness from ropes, webbing and locking hardware in order to use in protecting persons or animals or objects from injury or damage when ascending or descending above or the underground.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Salt Cubes Manufacturing
description: Includes obtaining salt cubes by washing high quality solar salt with controlled brine for using in Water treatment, textile dyeing, salt agent for soap, weed killers, cattle feeds.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Salt Packaging
description: Includes packaging salt in consumer packs and set for final consumption, it can be granulated, in cubes, or powdered, it should not involve any form of processing prior to packaging.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Salt Refining
description: Includes refining table salt, which is extracted from salty waters or saltpeters, or produced by sea water desalination, and packaging for consumption purposes.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Sanitary Napkins Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing ladies sanitary napkins made of cloth or synthetic disposable materials.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sauces, Spreads and Condiments Preparation
description: Includes preparing and mixing of poultry, meat or vegetable based spice mixes and cooking aids in dehydrated or moisture form, including packaging in sealed packs, compressed cubes or tablets.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sawing Discs and Cutting Blades Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing linear cutting plates and blades, circular or semi-circular cutting discs and other sharpened cutting or sawing devices, either manually or by power - driven equipment and machinery.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Sawmilling and Planning Of Wood
description: Includes workshops engaged in the sawmilling, cutting and latching of wood in order to produce boards, plywood and hardwood.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Scaffolds and Ladders Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing temporary frames of metal pipes used to support people and materials in the constructions or repair of buildings, also attic ladder, bridge ladder, cat ladder, extension ladder , fixed and ladders portable .
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: School and Hospital Furniture Manufacturing
description: Include manufacturing all kinds of furniture used in schools, laboratories, hospitals and others, such as seats, tables, desks and beds, also other fittings, such as shelves, cupboards, display windows, platforms and others.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Screwing Tools and Requisites Manufacturing
description: TBD
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Self Adhesive Labels Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of self adhesivecommercial and advertising labels and signs. This includes recutting, printing and preparation for various purposes.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Printing And Service Activities Related To Printing
name: Service Activities Related To Printing
description: Service Activities Related To Printing

name: Sesame Halva Manufacturing
description: This covers the preparation of Sesame Halva which is made of sesame seeds under different stages and without any additions. The seeds are roasted, ground then filled for final consumption.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sewing Machines and Accessories Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing manual, electrical, electronic and computerized stitching and embroidering clothing, fabrics, shoes and leather products, whether a one person or Industrial sewing machines for automated process of stitching, it involves the needles and other accessories.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sewing Yarn Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing yarn from natural or synthetic fibers for using in hand or machine sewing, crocheting, knitting or embroidery.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Shoes Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men and women footwear for different purposes and of any material, involving whole or parts of the footwear whether by the traditional manual process or mechanical.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of wood, wood products and Furniture
name: Shop Fixtures Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing fixtures in groceries, consumer complexes, bookshops, small shops and exhibition halls, such fixtures are shelves, goods preserving cupboards, counters and iron cupboards...etc.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Silos Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing with galvanized steel storage silos for storage of grains and other products, including flat bottom silos, truck load silos, farm silos, hopper silos.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Silver Extraction From Chemical Wastes
description: Includes extracting silver from photographic films wastes, radiograph films, films processing chemicals or any other chemicals composing silver , then form in pieces or ingots for manufacturing dyes and paints.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Slippers and Sandals Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men and women open-sided slippers and sandals made for different uses and by any material, involving the traditional manual or mechanical processes.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Soap and Hair Care Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing hair care products like shampoo, oils, lotions, tonics, whether chemically originated or being natural extracts (herbs). Also included is manufacturing toilet and hand washing soap in bars and liquid, in addition toilet foamy soap and similar products.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Socks Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men, ladies and sport socks from wool, cotton, nylon and polyester to use in protecting the foot and absorb sweat.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Soft Drinks Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of beverages and soft drinks mixed with flavors or fruit extracts.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Solar Panels Assembling
description: Includes assembling solar panels (photovoltaic) which generate electrical power by converting solar radiation into direct current electricity.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Solar Panels Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing solar panels (photovoltaic) which generate electrical power by converting solar radiation into direct current electricity which can be directly consumed or can be stored in battery to use later.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Soup Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of meat or vegetable soup and packing in metal or plastic cans for instant use, it includes also manufacturing the cookable soup powder as well as the flavors and creams.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Cotton and metal nets and ropes manufacturing
name: Special Purposes Fabrics and Fibers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing natural and synthetic fabrics and fibers, to use in tyre industry, or in casting concrete molds or cladding construction installations .. etc.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Specialized Industrial Machinery and Equipment Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing or assembling converting industry specialized machinery to install in factories and plants such as, foodstuff, weaving and spinning, paper, printing, oil refining, construction, mining and packaging machinery and equipment...etc.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Specialized Precision Equipment Manufacturing
description: Include manufacturing of laboratory, surgical, medical examination, engineering drawing and oilfield test and analysis equipment.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Spices Packaging
description: Includes re-packaging dried and powdered spices, whether, pure or blended in well sealed consumer bags or packs and make ready for final consumption. This activity does not cover firms that are usually classified under No 5211-05.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Split Air-Conditioner Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the split units, whether or not linked with general central air-conditioning system.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sponge Mattresses Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturingmattresses internally fitted with sponge ofvarying density.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Sponge Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of natural and synthetic sponge products, used in bathrooms, utensils washing, in packaging, and in manufacturing garments or other products.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Spongy Pillow Manufacturing
description: Environment Protection and Development Authority Department of Civil Defense
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sports Goods Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of sporting and athletic articles and equipment for outdoor and indoor games, such as rackets, balls, fishing and hunting requisites, roller skates, gymnasium and fitness centers or athletic equipment.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sports Wears Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing men and women sportswear such as sweat shirts, sports jersey, boxer shorts, track pants and sports shorts…etc
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Spring Mattresses Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing mattresses fitted with spring using wire coils.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Stained Glass Forming
description: Includes manufacturing glass sheets by cutting stained glass to small pieces, fit them tightly together, by lead or any other mastic material, to form pictorial or decorative designs and then fix these sheets on frames made of wood, aluminum profile or any other metal profiles or lixon, this activity also includes any other industry related to stained glass forming.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Stamps Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing rubber, wood, steel stamps which are used primarily to authenticate documents and products.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Stationery Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing rulers, pencil sharpeners, rubbers and paper punching and wrapping tools which are operated manually or electrically.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel Bars Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing steel bars for structural reinforcement, or in industries engaged in fabricating various metallic products, such bars which are produced by means of remelting ingots and iron residues and scraps
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel Cable Reels Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of steel cables to use in packing cable and wire.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel Fabrication and Welding Workshop
description: Includes the workshops involved in the fabrication of a variety of metal products by cutting, bending, and assembling processes, including metal frameworks or skeletons for construction, industrial frameworks in metal…etc.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel Hangars and Sheds Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing of prefabricated buildings and steel structures used as factories, warehouses, airplanes hangars, sheds and other buildings and constructions. It also includes other related operations and materials transportation to work sites.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel Pipes and Fittings Manufacturing
description: Includes cutting, forming and welding iron panels to manufacture steel pipes used in constructions and laying pipelines, the same is for the connectors and fittings.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel Tubes and Fittings Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing steel and galvanized tubes, such as welded and extruded steel tubes, high pressure cast iron tubes and others, as well as connectors, knobs, angles and others.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel Wool Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing Steel wool by broaching low-carbon steel for using as an abrasive in finishing and repair work for polishing wood or metal objects, cleaning household cookware.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Steel and Alloy Products Cutting
description: Includes cutting carbon steel and alloy products to produce steel plates, structural beams, columns, angles, seamless and welded pipes.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Coating, insulations, seals and protection materials manufactu
name: Structural Steel Coating and Treatment
description: Includes firms which carry out coating of structural steel used in the support of concrete buildings with anti-erosion and rust-proof materials as protective means against effects of salts, humidity, chemical pollutants and others. This also includes pre-coating treatment of any holes or cracks in steel rods, or cutting and plying of rods according to the required specifications in order to form grids or support column molds, or to install the steel structures on site.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Structural Steel Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing steel structures for building and construction purposes such as structural steel used in constructing bridges, tunnels and communication and energy transfer towers.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sugar Candies Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing candies from a solution of sugar in water or milk, then flavorings and colorants are added
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sugar Cubes Manufacturing
description: Includes preparing sugar cubes by wetting granulated sugar and pressing cubed moulds and the drying and packing.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Sugar Packaging
description: Includes packaging refined sugar in consumer packs and set for final consumption, it can be granulated, in cubes, or powdered, it should not involve any form of processing prior to packaging.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of bags, shoes and leather products
name: Suitcases Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of suitcases from genuine leather and its substitutes, and other suitcases partly manufactured from leather, and suitcases manufactured totally from substitute materials such as plastic, aluminum, or woven fabrics.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Surfboards Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing surfboardsusing polyurethane or polystyrene foam and covered with layers of fiberglass, cloth and polyester in order to make light and strong enough to support wave riders.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of tyres and rubber products
name: Synthetic Sponge Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing synthetic sponge from its primary chemical substances, and set in pieces, cubes or panels useable producing mattresses, furniture, or in wrapping and packaging etc.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Synthetic or Artificial Staple Fibers Manufacturing
description: Environment Protection and Development Authority Department of Civil Defense
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tailoring and Embroidery Requisites Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing requisites and accessories used in tailoring and embroidering such as buttons, threads and badges, emblems and marks to decorate garments and official uniforms or to use also in upholstering and curtain finishing.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacture of motor vehicles, motorcycles and its spare parts
name: Tanker Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturingmobile reservoirs, tanks and similar containers of metal to transport water and petroleum products and which are designed to deal with a heavy sloshing load and the risk of collision or other accident.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tanks Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of vertical circular tanks constructed on ground surface or suspended on special support foundations, or horizontal tanks embedded underground and made of welded steel panels, to use for storage of water, oil derivatives, liquefied gas or other liquid substances, it0 does not include upper-buildings water tanks, as they are classified under activity number 2811-03
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tar Manufacturing
description: Includes producing tar from coal, wood, petroleum or beat through destructive distillation to use in road paving and water and humidity proofing in buildings.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tea Blending and Packaging
description: Includes blending different types of tea to produce specially flavored brands and then pack for final consumption.
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Telecommunications Equipment and Accessories Assembling
description: Includes assembling the parts and components to produce the equipment and hardware used for the purposes of the transmission of voice, data, text, sound, and video using a wired or wireless telecommunications infrastructure.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Telecommunications Equipment and Accessories Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the equipment and hardware used for the purposes of the transmission of voice, data, text, sound, and video using a wired or wireless telecommunications infrastructure.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Telecommunications Wires Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing metal and fiberglass wires used to carry telecommunication signals and data, such wires are used in telephony, TV and video, computer network and the internet, marine cables.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tents, Awnings and Tarpaulin Manufacturing
description: Includes making tents and awnings to use as shade from the sun in or protecting from rain in shops and buildings, also, covers and tarpaulin used to cover goods stored in open air or transported in vehicles.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Test and Analysis Chemicals Manufacturing
description: Includes producing solutions, serums and chemicals intended for medical, agricultural, petroleum and engineering testing and analyzing, whether inside specialized lab or on site.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tin Cans and Containers Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing cans and containers made of tin, aluminum, copper or any other metal.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

activityGroup: Manufacturing of paper and paper products
name: Tissues and Napkins Manufacturing
description: Includes the manufacture of tissue paper of all kinds such as facial tissue, kitchen towels, and toilet paper.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tomato Paste Manufacturing
description: Includes making tomato paste by cooking tomatoes to reduce moisture, then straining them to remove the seeds and skin, and cooking them again to produce the thick paste
authority: RAK Municipality- Public Health Department, Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Tooth and Mouth Care Products Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the preparations for oral hygiene, including denture adhesive cream, cushions, pastes, cleansing tablets, brushes, dental plate powder, teeth whiteners, also, oral solutions, mouth moisturizes, mouthwash, mouth and throat rinse.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Towels Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing the absorbent textile towels are made from cotton, rayon and are used for drying or wiping.
authority: Environment Protection and Development Authority, Department of Civil Defense

name: Traffic Signs Manufacturing
description: Includes manufacturing traffic signs made of aluminum, sheet iron or other materials, used for road directions or traffic instructions, also guiding signs in public places and facilities, shops, hospitals, hotels, banks, parks, governmental offices and others.

authority: Tourism Development Authority, Directorate General of RAK Police

name: Hotel Management
description: Includes managing hotels owned by others and licensed by the competent authorities, involving, supplying the personnel who carry out the duties and responsibilities, provided that the prevailing laws and regulations are observed.

name: In Bound Tour Operator
description: Includes firms that organize local incentive tours or tours for foreigners to attend conferences and events, it involves handling visas, transport and residence.

name: One Star Hotel
description: Includes hotels which lack additional amenities and offer few services, they offer rooms with bath and colored TV, daily room cleaning, reception service, telephone and fax for guests, extended breakfast and beverage.

name: Out Bound Tour Operator
description: Includes firms that organize and sell tourist programs abroad via travels and tourism agents.

name: Resort
description: Includes firms specialized in providing accommodation facilities, including beach cabins and flats for a short-stay in tourist destinations whether in beaches or mountains, beside a suitable accommodation, which may be taken on rental or on daily charge bases, all other tourist services are provided.

name: Three Star Hotel
description: Includes hotels which, in addition to the standard two stars hotel, offer spacious accommodations, access to a fitness center and swimming pools. On-site restaurants typically serve breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: Tourism Consultancy
description: Tourism Consultancy

name: Tourism and Recreation Consultants
description: Includes specialized firms engaged in preparing marketing and feasibility studies along with the required surveys and field questionnaires, involving identifying opportunities for new tourist facilities and services, business plans and project evaluations programs, project management.

name: Tourism and Recreation Consultants
description: Includes specialized firms engaged in preparing marketing and feasibility studies along with the required surveys and field questionnaires, involving identifying opportunities for new tourist facilities and services, business plans and project evaluations programs, project management.

name: Tourist Guiding Services
description: Includes firms providing tourist guiding services by arranging guided visits to tourist destinations in Dubai or all over U.A.E., or to supply other tourist firms with tour guides on demand. These guides are licensed by the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing provided that they hold the right tourist qualifications.

name: Travel Agent
description: Includes any person who sells air tickets outbound trip, and provides related services including accommodation, visas, tours organizing and transportation, in addition to selling tourist programs organized by outbound tour operators.

name: Two Star Hotel
description: Includes hotels offer rooms come with basic amenities, including televisions and telephones. provide limited restaurant services, such as serving breakfast, room service is not typically offered.

name: University Dormitory
description: Includes firms which provide furnished residential quarters for large numbers of students and also has extra amenities such study and dining rooms, kitchen facilities, recreation rooms, gym, Internet and TV facilities.

name: Animal Etiquette and Behaviour Consultant
description: Includes veterinary clinics involved in animal behavior consultancy for pet and farm animals, to solve behavior problems, such as, aggression, anxiety, fears and phobias. Treating these problems will help animal owners to have better relations with them and improve the productivity in the case of farm animals, as well as reducing the risks of injury, it also involves animal etiquette which offers an approach to the positive reinforcement methods of training in all the activities that is provided for the animal.

name: Veterinarian Clinic
description: TBD
authority: Ministry of Climate Change and Environment

name: Veterinary Equipment and Instruments Trading
description: Includes reselling equipment and instruments used to deal with the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of disease, disorder and injury in domesticate or wild animals.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Antennas Installation and Repair
description: Includes installing and fixing antennas to use in radio and television broadcasting, telecommunication receivers, wireless computer network, radar.

name: Antiques and Rare Collections Repair
description: Includes the firms specialized in repairing and maintaining antiques and precious collections, including luxurious furniture, work of arts, manuscripts, books.

name: Auto Seats Cleaning
description: Includes the manual and machine deep cleaning for car seats, other than the cleaning carried when the whole car is washed.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Computer Repair and Maintenance
description: includes the repair of desktop and laptop computers and peripheral equipment , involving magnetic disk drives, flash drives and other storage devices, printers, monitors, keyboards, internal and external computer modems, servers.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Cookers and Cook Stove Repair
description: Includes repairing electric, gas, coal or kerosene burners, ovens and cookers.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Electronic Instruments Devices and Equipment Repair
description: Includes repairing all electronics appliances and equipment not given in details in this class

name: Heavy Duty Equipment and Machinery Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes firms repair machinery and equipment, lifts, escalators, boilers, central kitchens, automatic washing equipment, electric generators, water pumps, tower cranesetc.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

name: Jewellery Designing
description: Includes designing the models of gold and precious metals jewellery prior to mechanical or manual production, involving pre-manufacturing drawings, setting technical specifications, materials and production costs calculation, testing to ensure compliance of materials with safety and quality standards.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

name: Jewellery Repair
description: Includes repairing adornment jewellery such as brooches, earnings, necklaces, bracelets, rings, which are made of gold, platinum, palladium, titanium, silver and gemstones.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

name: Knives, Scissors Repair and Sharpening
description: Includes repairing and sharpening knives and scissors for different uses.

name: Leather and Similar Products Repair
description: Includes repairing leather goods other than footwear, such as hand bags, wallets, and belts, wearing apparel, whether made of natural or synthetic leather.

name: Locks Repair
description: Includes repairing the mechanical or electronic fastening device which are released by a physical object, such as key, keycard, fingerprint, security token.

name: Marine Equipment Repairing and Maintenance
description: Includes installing and repairing the equipment related to structures for marine transportation, such as ships, boats, floating structures, pontoons, barges, cranes, the concerned equipment include propulsion systems, steering systems, engines, air-conditions, generators, ventilation blowers, boilers, spindles, pipes, communication and measuring devices.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Mobile Phone Repair
description: Includes firms engaged in cellular mobile phones maintenance and repair, including reconditioning, screen replacement, antenna, phone housing, water damaged phones and damaged parts change.

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Mobile Phone Upgrading Services
description: Includes upgrading operating systems in cellular mobile phones, as well as performing modification on the basic software. The modifications cover installing anti-virus programs, reinforcing transmission systems, handling programming related malfunctions, such as screen vanishing, decoding code number, data updating, phone programming to match the transmission system, phone adjustment.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Musical Instruments Repair and Maintenance
description: Includes repairing and Maintaining electronic and normal musical instruments like stringed, wind, and percussion instruments, pipes, accordions, organs.

name: Offshore Oil and Natural Gas Wells Equipment Repairing
description: Includes the reparation and maintenance operations carried outside the UAE for the equipment involved in the various operations of oil and natural gas production, from primary stages of survey and exploration up to storage.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

name: Ships and Boats Maintenance Services
description: Includes firms that carry out ships and boats maintenanceas regarding re-painting and cleaning, as well as other simple operations which do not include reparations or total maintenance, which are classified under Class 3512.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

name: Ships and Boats Repair
description: Includes the reparation of vessels, wooden ships, yachts, sports boats, fishing ships and boatsetc. also, re-building, renovation, full maintenance, including refitting or replacement of motors and parts.
officeRequirement: Co-Working/Flexi-Desk Upto 3 Visas - Physical office for more than 3 Visas

name: Shoe Repair
description: Includes manual and mechanical repairing of different gents, ladies and children footwear.

name: Spectacles Repair
description: Includes repairing ophthalmic goods, eyeglasses, sunglasses, lenses ground to prescription, contact lenses, safety goggles

activityGroup: Repairing of electrical and electronic appliances
name: Telecommunications Equipment Repair
